original: Edberg, Rolf Filip, chefredaktör, Göteborg, f. 14/3/12 i Lysvik, Värml. 1., av pastor C. F. E. o. Mandis Carlsson. G. 37 m. Astrid Persson. Barn: Ranveig f. 41, Birgitta 43, Jörgen 45. — Stud:ex. 32. Medarb. i Länstidn. i Östersund 33-34, red. f. Oskarshamns Nyh. 34-37, andre red. f. Östgöten 38-40, chefred, f. densamma 41-45, chefred. f. Ny Tid i Gbg sed. 45. Led. av stadsfullm. (s) i Linköp. 38-45, led. av riksd. andra kamm. 41-44, av 41 års utredn. ang. samviömma värnpL, av 44 års utredn. f. rev. av tryckfrih:-fÖrordn., av 46 års läkemed :utredn. o. av deleg. rör. nord. medborg iiskaps-frågor 46, led. av radio nd sed. 47. Skr.: Ge dem en chans (39), I morgon Norden (44), redig. Arthur Eng-bergs saml. tal o. skr. (3 bd 46). Pseud.: picaro.
translated: Edberg, Rolf Filip, editor-in-chief, Gothenburg, born March 14, 1912 in Lysvik, Värmland, firstborn of Pastor C. F. E. and Mandis Carlsson. Married in 1937 to Astrid Persson. Children: Ranveig, born in 1941, Birgitta in 1943, Jörgen in 1945. He passed his studentexamen (high school graduation) in 1932. He worked as a collaborator in Länstidningen in Östersund from 1933 to 1934, editorial director for Oskarshamns Nyheter from 1934 to 1937, second editorial director for Östgöten from 1938 to 1940, editor-in-chief for Östgöten from 1941 to 1945, and editor-in-chief for Ny Tid in Gothenburg since 1945. He was a member of the city council (Social Democratic Party) in Linköping from 1938 to 1945, a member of the second chamber of parliament from 1941 to 1944, and a member of the committee for joint defense in 1941 and for the revision of the freedom of the press decree in 1944. He was a member of the committee for the investigation of pharmaceuticals in 1946 and a member of the delegation for Nordic citizenship issues in 1946. He has been a member of the Swedish Radio Corporation since 1947. His published works include: "Give Them a Chance" (1939), "Tomorrow's North" (1944), and edited collections of speeches and writings by Arthur Engberg (3 volumes, 1946). His pseudonym is "picaro."
